thread.title: SUMMERSKIN to Pilot Yugen, MobiTen's New Software Solution to Rid Apparel Companies of Spread Sheets

author: PR.com
title: SUMMERSKIN to Pilot Yugen, MobiTen's New Software Solution to Rid Apparel Companies of Spread Sheets
text:
SUMMERSKIN to Pilot Yugen, MobiTen's New Software Solution to Rid Apparel Companies of Spread Sheets
MobiTen spearheading the technology evolution in the Apparel Industry.
Portland, OR, October 14, 2015 --( PR.com )-- MobiTen is pleased to announce Portland-based apparel brand SUMMERSKIN has signed to pilot YuGen, MobiTen’s newest software solution that automates the Product Creation Process for the Apparel and Soft Goods Industry.
“I was sold with the mobile fitting features,” says Summer Kramer, CEO of SUMMERSKIN, referring to the accompanying app which syncs photos taken on the phone during fit sessions directly with the system.
“We are inspired by Apparel Entrepreneurs like Summer and are happy to help with Software solutions that eliminate repetition and tedious process management,” says Leon Yeh, CEO of MobiTen.
During the Software build, MobiTen extensively consulted with Industry experts, Material Managers, Product Developers, Tech Designers and Designers to create a system that follows apparel industry best practices to ensure YuGen will work for any size apparel business.
YuGen utilizes latest Cloud-based software technology and security to free apparel companies from spread sheets, streamline the product creation cycle and minimize costly errors. While a powerful engine takes care of complex tasks in the background, the user interface is easy and intuitive to navigate. YuGen is a visual communication tool for a very visual industry.
About MobiTen: MobiTen is a Portland, OR-based mobile technology company, focused on mobile enterprise solutions for Fortune 1000 companies.
Our newest product, YUGEN was specifically designed for the needs of apparel product creation and is now available as paid pilot at www.getyugen.com.
Clients include Karcher, CH2M Hill, Fortis Construction and Northrop Grumman.
About SUMMERSKIN: Based in Portland, Oregon, SUMMERSKIN exists to bring health, happiness, and fun to everyday lifestyle by providing UPF 50+ sun protective women's apparel and accessories. SUMMERSKIN’s classic silhouettes are designed and manufactured in the USA using luxurious soft spun Bamboo and Tencel blends. SUMMERSKIN fabrics are never chemically treated to achieve a UPF factor and sun protection will not wash out. www.yoursummerskin.com
